detail_desc: Treggings in a stretch, denim-look cotton blend. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. The cotton content of the treggings is partly recycled.
Dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers woven in a linen blend with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in lace with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Soft body in lace and mesh with soft, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Deep V-neck front and back and a lined gusset.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Set with a cotton top, shorts and sun hat. Jersey top with short frilled sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Sun hat with narrow ties and a cotton lining.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Joggers in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped front pockets, contrasting colour details and ribbed hems.
Trainers in grained imitation leather with lacing at the front and contrasting colour details. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and patterned soles.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge, padded tongue and lacing at the front. Contrasting colour details in imitation suede at the heels and toes, and a print motif on the tongue and one side. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles with a patterned underneath for a good grip. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Ankle-length leggings in jacquard-patterned jersey with a high, elasticated waist and flared hems.
V-neck blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise around the neckline, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and gently gathered tiers to the hem.

prod_name: FUNC. SB Texas water res TP
detail_desc: Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool and glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace suspender belt to hold nylon stockings up with elastication at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Long dress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wrapover front. Seam with narrow ties at the waist that fasten on one side, and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, tapered legs and wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Mesh inner shorts.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
V-neck top in airy jersey with a button placket, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves and an inset lace trim at the waist. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Size from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.
Thin, patterned socks with a short shaft. 20 denier.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and press-studs at the back of the neck.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Straight-cut coat in a felted wool and cashmere blend with notch lapels, dropped shoulders, concealed press-studs, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined sleeves.
Fully-fashioned trainers with rubber details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Bracelets of metal and braided cord decorated with beads. Adjustable length.

Set with a long-sleeved top and a skirt in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Skater skirt with covered elastication at the waist.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in an airy, textured weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a gathered seam under the bust and a seam at the hem of the skirt for added width. Lined at the top.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey with a flounce around the neckline that continues over the shoulders.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Relaxed fit with a pleat at the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Shorts in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.One pair with an all-over print.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Mesh inner shorts.

Calf-length trenchcoat in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and shawl lapels. Long, straight-cut sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Hi-tops with a pile-lined inside, lightly padded edge and tongue, fixed lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back.

Knee-length dress in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist.
Kids Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and scalloped trims around the neckline, button band and cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jersey dress with a small gathered collar and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with 3/4-length frill-trimmed sleeves, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Earrings with metal rings and fabric tassels at the ends. Length 5.5 cm.
Shirt in a printed cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length skirt in a heavily draping fine knit with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Longer top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Short-sleeved, patterned dress in sheer mesh with appliqués, a rounded collar at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the next. Elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
